pageProduct.name: Sukin Purely Ageless Pro Revitalising Overnight Mask
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Powered by Bakuchiol, a natural alternative to Retinol, Hyaluronic Acid and Australian Kangaroo Paw Flower Extract, this rich and hydrating mask visibly firms, plumps, and helps smooth fine lines and wrinkles and even out skin tone overnight.  

Warnings

This product contains natural active ingredients. Patch testing and gradual introduction is recommended. If irritation occurs reduce frequency or discontinue use & seek medical advice. For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes. 

Common Uses

98% of users saw a visible improvement in the appearance and condition of their skin. *using total Purely Ageless PRO range

Ingredients

Water (Aqua), Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Coco-Caprylate, Glycerin, Cetearyl Alcohol, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Polyglyceryl-10 Stearate, Hydroxypropyl Starch Phosphate, Stearic Acid, Polyglyceryl-6 Distearate, Bakuchiol, Hydrolyzed Sodium Hyaluronate, Anigozanthos Flavidus Extract (Kangaroo Paw Plant), Davidsonia Jerseyana Fruit Extract (Davidson Plum), Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, Citric Acid, Ethylhexylglycerin, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Fragrance (Parfum)*, Linalool**, Citronellol**, Limonene**, Geraniol**.*Natural Fragrance **Component of Natural Fragrance

Directions

APPLICATION: In the evening, apply a small amount to freshly cleansed face, neck and decolletage, avoiding the eye area.
